properties.command: bash -c 'num=${TERMINAL_CMD_COUNT:-0}; square_icons=("󰎡" "󰎤" "󰎧" "󰎪" "󰎭" "󰎱" "󰎳" "󰎶" "󰎹" "󰎼"); circle_icons=("󰰖" "󰲠" "󰲢" "󰲤" "󰲦" "󰲨" "󰲪" "󰲬" "󰲮" "󰲰" "󰿵"); is_even=$((num % 2 == 0)); result=""; for ((i=0; i<${#num}; i++)); do digit=${num:$i:1}; if [ $is_even -eq 1 ]; then result+="${circle_icons[$digit]}"; else result+="${square_icons[$digit]}"; fi; done; printf "$result"'

bash -lc 'cd=$(pwd -P); if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then root=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel); rel=${cd#$root}; if [ -z "$rel" ]; then basename "$root"; else printf "%s%s" "$(basename "$root")" "$rel"; fi; else if [ "$cd" = "$HOME" ]; then echo "~"; elif [[ "$cd" == "$HOME"/* ]]; then echo "~${cd#$HOME}"; else basename "$cd"; fi; fi'

bash -lc 'if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then len=${#branch}; if [ $len -gt 20 ]; then truncated="${branch:0:20}"; ellipsis=$(printf "\uf141"); branch="$truncated$ellipsis"; fi; if ! git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then color="#cc6666"; else color="#808080"; fi; printf "<%s>\uf418 %s</>" "$color" "$branch"; fi; fi'

bash -c 'num=${TERMINAL_CMD_COUNT:-0}; square_icons=("󰋌" "󰾔" "󰾔" "󰾔" "󰾔" "󰾔" "󰾔" "󰾔" "󰐆" "󰿠"); circle_icons=("" "󱎖" "󰮔" "󰠠" "󱤅" "󰎆" "󱠇" "󱠆" "󰅡" "󰌡" "" ""); is_even=$((num % 2 == 0)); if [ $is_even -eq 1 ]; then icons=("${circle_icons[@]}"); else icons=("${square_icons[@]}"); fi; idx=$((RANDOM % ${#icons[@]})); printf "<#c0c0c0>${icons[$idx]}</>"'
